Record Class ButtonDef<R>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.ButtonDef<R>
Type Parameters:
R - the type of the result associated with this button
Record Components:
type - the type of the button (e.g., OK, CANCEL, etc.)
resultHandler - the handler to process the result when the button is pressed
action - the action to execute when the button is clicked
enabled - a function taking the dialog pane as argument and returning a BooleanExpression to determine whether the button is enabled
public record ButtonDef<R>(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType type, DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler<R> resultHandler, Consumer<InputDialogPane<? extends Object>> action, Function<InputDialogPane<? extends Object>, javafx.beans.binding.BooleanExpression> enabled) extends Record
Represents a definition for a button within a dialog pane. The ButtonDef class encapsulates the button's type, the result handler to process the action associated with the button, the action to perform when the button is triggered, and a function to control the enablement state of the button.

  • Constructor Details

    • ButtonDef

      public ButtonDef(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType type, DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler<R> resultHandler, Consumer<InputDialogPane<? extends Object>> action, Function<InputDialogPane<? extends Object>, javafx.beans.binding.BooleanExpression> enabled)
      Creates an instance of a ButtonDef record class.
      Parameters:
      type - the value for the type record component
      resultHandler - the value for the resultHandler record component
      action - the value for the action record component
      enabled - the value for the enabled record component

  • Method Details

    • cancel

      public static <Q> ButtonDef<Q> cancel()
      Creates and returns a ButtonDef instance configured as a cancel button. The cancel button is defined with a ButtonType.CANCEL, a result handler that always returns true, an action that performs no operation, and an enablement state that is always true.
      Type Parameters:
      Q - the type of the result associated with this button
      Returns:
      a ButtonDef instance representing a cancel button

    • of

      public static <T> ButtonDef<T> of(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType btn)
      Creates a new ButtonDef instance with a default configuration based on the given ButtonType.

      The returned ButtonDef will have: - An action that performs no operation. - A result handler that always returns true. - An enablement state that is always true.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the result associated with the button
      Parameters:
      btn - the ButtonType representing the type of the button (e.g., OK, CANCEL, etc.)
      Returns:
      a new ButtonDef instance configured with the provided ButtonType

    • of

      public static <T> ButtonDef<T> of(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType btn, Consumer<InputDialogPane<?>> action)
      Creates a new ButtonDef instance with the specified button type, a consumer action to handle button events, and a default result handler.

      The returned ButtonDef will have: - An action that performs no operation. - An enablement state that is always true.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the result associated with the button
      Parameters:
      btn - the ButtonType representing the type of the button (e.g., OK, CANCEL, etc.)
      action - a Consumer specifying the operation to execute when the button is clicked
      Returns:
      a new ButtonDef instance configured with the provided button type and action

    • of

      public static <T> ButtonDef<T> of(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType btn, DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler<T> resultHandler, Consumer<InputDialogPane<?>> action)
      Creates a new ButtonDef instance configured with the specified button type, action, and result handler. By default, the button is always enabled.

      The returned ButtonDef will have: - An enablement state that is always true.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the result associated with the button
      Parameters:
      btn - the ButtonType representing the type of the button (e.g., OK, CANCEL, etc.)
      resultHandler - a DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler to handle the result when the button is pressed
      action - a Consumer specifying the operation to execute when the button is clicked
      Returns:
      a new ButtonDef instance configured with the provided parameters and a default enablement state

    • of

      public static <Q> ButtonDef<Q> of(javafx.scene.control.ButtonType type, DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler<Q> resultHandler, Consumer<InputDialogPane<?>> action, Function<InputDialogPane<?>, javafx.beans.binding.BooleanExpression> enabled)
      Creates a new ButtonDef instance with the specified parameters.
      Type Parameters:
      Q - the type of the result associated with the button
      Parameters:
      type - the ButtonType representing the type of the button (e.g., OK, CANCEL, etc.)
      resultHandler - a DialogPaneBuilder.ResultHandler to handle the result when the button is pressed
      action - a Consumer specifying the operation to execute when the button is clicked
      enabled - a BooleanExpression that determines whether the button is enabled or disabled
      Returns:
      a new ButtonDef instance configured with the provided parameters
